12. Equivocation and Channel Capacity

如果信道有噪声，一般不可能通过对接收信号E进行任何操作来重建原始消息或传输信号。然而，存在传输信息的最佳方式，可以对抗噪声。这就是我们现在要考虑的问题。

If the channel is noisy it is not in general possible to reconstruct the original message or the transmitted signal with certainty by any operation on the received signal E. There are, however, ways of transmitting the information which are optimal in combating noise. This is the problem which we now consider.

假设有两个可能的符号 0 和 1，我们以每秒 1000 个符号的速率传输，概率为p 0 = p 1 = 。因此，我们的源以每秒 1000 比特的速率产生信息。在传输过程中，噪声会引入错误，因此平均而言，100 个中有 1 个被错误接收（0 被误认为 1，或 1 被误认为 0）。信息？肯定少于 1000 比特每秒，因为大约 1% 的接收符号是不正确的。我们的第一反应可能是说速率是 990 比特每秒，仅仅减去预期的错误数。这并不令人满意，因为它没有考虑到接收者对错误发生位置的缺乏了解。我们可以将其推向极端，假设噪声如此之大，以至于接收的符号完全独立于发送的符号。接收 1 的概率等于发送的任何符号，接收 0 的概率也是如此。那么大约一半的接收符号完全正确，这完全是偶然的，我们会认为系统传输了 500 比特每秒，而实际上根本没有传输任何信息。通过完全放弃信道并在接收点抛硬币，可以获得同样“良好”的传输。

Suppose there are two possible symbols 0 and 1, and we are transmitting at a rate of 1000 symbols per second with probabilities p0 = p1 = . Thus our source is producing information at the rate of 1000 bits per second. During transmission the noise introduces errors so that, on the average, 1 in 100 is received incorrectly (a 0 as 1, or 1 as 0). What is the rate of transmission of information? Certainly less than 1000 bits per second since about 1% of the received symbols are incorrect. Our first impulse might be to say the rate is 990 bits per second, merely subtracting the expected number of errors. This is not satisfactory since it fails to take into account the recipient's lack of knowledge of where the errors occur. We may carry it to an extreme case and suppose the noise so great that the received symbols are entirely independent of the transmitted symbols. The probability of receiving 1 is whatever was transmitted and similarly for 0. Then about half of the received symbols are correct due to chance alone, and we would be giving the system credit for transmitting 500 bits per second while actually no information is being transmitted at all. Equally “good” transmission would be obtained by dispensing with the channel entirely and flipping a coin at the receiving point.

显然，对传输信息量应用的正确校正是接收信号中缺失的信息量，或者当我们收到实际发送的信号时的不确定性。从我们之前关于熵作为不确定性度量的讨论来看，在知道接收信号的情况下，使用消息的条件熵作为缺失信息的度量似乎是合理的。这确实是正确的定义，我们稍后会看到。按照这个想法，实际传输速率R可以通过从生产速率（即源的熵）中减去条件熵的平均速率来获得。

Evidently the proper correction to apply to the amount of information transmitted is the amount of this information which is missing in the received signal, or alternatively the uncertainty when we have received a signal of what was actually sent. From our previous discussion of entropy as a measure of uncertainty it seems reasonable to use the conditional entropy of the message, knowing the received signal, as a measure of this missing information. This is indeed the proper definition, as we shall see later. Following this idea the rate of actual transmission, R, would be obtained by subtracting from the rate of production (i.e., the entropy of the source) the average rate of conditional entropy.

R = H ( x ) —Hy ( x )​

R = H(x) — Hy(x)

为方便起见，条件熵H y ( x ) 称为模糊性。它测量接收信号的平均模糊性。

The conditional entropy Hy(x) will, for convenience, be called the equivocation. It measures the average ambiguity of the received signal.

在上述示例中，如果接收到 0，则传输 0 的后验概率为 0.99，传输 1 的后验概率为 0.01。如果接收到 1，则这些数字将反转。因此

In the example considered above, if a 0 is received the a posteriori probability that a 0 was transmitted is .99, and that a 1 was transmitted is .01. These figures are reversed if a 1 is received. Hence

H y ( x ) = — [.99 log .99 + 0.01 log 0.01]

Hy(x) = — [.99 log .99 + 0.01 log 0.01]

= .081 位/符号
= .081 bits/symbol

即每秒 81 比特。我们可以说系统正在传输速率为 1000 — 81 = 919 比特/秒。在极端情况下，0 被接收的可能性与 0 或 1 相同，1 也是如此，后验概率为，并且

or 81 bits per second. We may say that the system is transmitting at a rate 1000 — 81 = 919 bits per second. In the extreme case where a 0 is equally likely to be received as a 0 or 1 and similarly for 1, the a posteriori probabilities are , and

即每秒 1000 比特。传输速率理应为 0。

or 1000 bits per second. The rate of transmission is then 0 as it should be.

以下定理对模糊性给出了直观的解释，也证明了模糊性是唯一合适的度量。我们考虑一个通信系统和一个观察者（或辅助设备），观察者可以看到发送的内容和恢复的内容（由于噪声而出现错误）。观察者会记录恢复的消息中的错误，并通过“校正通道”将数据传输到接收点，以使接收器能够纠正错误。图 8以示意图的形式显示了这种情况。

The following theorem gives a direct intuitive interpretation of the equivocation and also serves to justify it as the unique appropriate measure. We consider a communication system and an observer (or auxiliary device) who can see both what is sent and what is recovered (with errors due to noise). This observer notes the errors in the recovered message and transmits data to the receiving point over a “correction channel” to enable the receiver to correct the errors. The situation is indicated schematically in Fig. 8.

图 8—校正系统示意图。

Fig. 8.—Schematic diagram of a correction system.

定理 10：如果校正通道的容量等于 H y ( x )，则可以对校正数据进行编码，以便通过此通道发送，并校正除任意小部分∊的错误之外的所有错误。如果通道容量小于 H y ( x ) ，则这是不可能的。

Theorem 10: If the correction channel has a capacity equal to Hy(x) it is possible to so encode the correction data as to send it over this channel and correct all but an arbitrarily small fraction ∊ of the errors. This is not possible if the channel capacity is less than Hy(x).

粗略地说，H y ( x ) 是附加信息量接收点必须每秒提供一次以纠正接收到的消息。

Roughly then, Hy(x) is the amount of additional information that must be supplied per second at the receiving point to correct the received message.

为了证明第一部分，考虑接收消息M ′ 和对应的原始消息M的长序列。将有对数形式的TH y ( x ) 个M可以合理地生成每个M ′。因此，我们每T秒要发送TH y ( x ) 个二进制数字。这可以通过容量为H y ( x )的信道上的∊错误频率来实现。

To prove the first part, consider long sequences of received message M′ and corresponding original message M. There will be logarithmically THy (x) of the M's which could reasonably have produced each M′. Thus we have THy(x) binary digits to send each T seconds. This can be done with ∊ frequency of errors on a channel of capacity Hy(x).

第二部分可以通过以下方式证明：首先，对于任何离散机会变量x、y、z

The second part can be proved by noting, first, that for any discrete chance variables x, y, z

H y ( x, z ) ≥ H y ( x )。

Hy(x, z) ≥ Hy(x).

左侧可以展开为

The left-hand side can be expanded to give

Hy ( z ) + Hyz ( x ) ≥Hy ( x )​​

Hy(z) + Hyz(x) ≥ Hy(x)

H yz ( x ) ≥ H y ( x ) — H y ( z ) ≥ H y ( x ) — H ( z )。

Hyz(x) ≥ Hy(x) — Hy(z) ≥ Hy(x) — H(z).

如果我们将x确定为源的输出，y确定为接收信号，z确定为通过校正信道发送的信号，则右侧是模糊性减去通过校正信道的传输速率。如果此信道的容量小于模糊性，则右侧将大于零，并且H yz ( x ) > 0。但这是在知道接收信号和校正信号的情况下发送内容的不确定性。如果大于零，则错误频率不能任意小。

If we identify x as the output of the source, y as the received signal and z as the signal sent over the correction channel, then the right-hand side is the equivocation less the rate of transmission over the correction channel. If the capacity of this channel is less than the equivocation the right-hand side will be greater than zero and Hyz(x) > 0. But this is the uncertainty of what was sent, knowing both the received signal and the correction signal. If this is greater than zero the frequency of errors cannot be arbitrarily small.

例子：

Example:

假设错误随机出现在二进制数字序列中：数字错误的概率为p ，正确概率为q = 1 — p。如果知道错误的位置，就可以纠正这些错误。因此，纠正通道只需发送有关这些位置的信息。这相当于从产生二进制数字的源进行传输，该源的概率为p表示 1（错误），q表示 0（正确）。这需要容量为
Suppose the errors occur at random in a sequence of binary digits: probability p that a digit is wrong and q = 1 — p that it is right. These errors can be corrected if their position is known. Thus the correction channel need only send information as to these positions. This amounts to transmitting from a source which produces binary digits with probability p for 1 (incorrect) and q for 0 (correct). This requires a channel of capacity

—[ p对数p + q对数q ]

—[p log p + q log q]

这是原有制度的模棱两可之处。
which is the equivocation of the original system.

根据上述恒等式，传输速率R可以写成另外两种形式。我们有

The rate of transmission R can be written in two other forms due to the identities noted above. We have

R = H ( x ) —Hy ( x )​

R = H(x) — Hy(x)

= H ( y ) — H x ( y )

= H ( x ) + H ( y ) — H ( x, y )。
= H(y) — Hx(y)

= H(x) + H(y) — H(x, y).

第一个定义表达式已经被解释为发送的信息量减去发送内容的不确定性。第二个表达式测量的是接收的信息量减去其中由噪音引起的部分。第三个表达式是两个信息量的总和减去联合熵，因此在某种意义上是两者共同的每秒比特数。因此，这三个表达式都具有一定的直观意义。

The first defining expression has already been interpreted as the amount of information sent less the uncertainty of what was sent. The second measures the amount received less the part of this which is due to noise. The third is the sum of the two amounts less the joint entropy and therefore in a sense is the number of bits per second common to the two. Thus all three expressions have a certain intuitive significance.

噪声信道的容量C应为最大可能的传输速率，即源与信道正确匹配时的速率。因此，我们将信道容量定义为

The capacity C of a noisy channel should be the maximum possible rate of transmission, i.e., the rate when the source is properly matched to the channel. We therefore define the channel capacity by

C = 最大 ( H ( x ) — H y ( x ))

C = Max (H(x) — Hy(x))

其中最大值是针对用作信道输入的所有可能信息源的。如果信道无噪声，则H y ( x ) = 0。该定义等同于已经给出的无噪声信道定义，因为根据定理 8信道的最大熵是其容量。

where the maximum is with respect to all possible information sources used as input to the channel. If the channel is noiseless, Hy(x) = 0. The definition is then equivalent to that already given for a noiseless channel since the maximum entropy for the channel is its capacity by Theorem 8.

13. 含噪声离散信道的基本定理

13. The Fundamental Theorem for a Discrete Channel with Noise

为噪声信道定义一个确定的容量C似乎令人惊讶，因为在这种情况下我们永远无法发送某些信息。然而，很明显，通过以冗余形式发送信息可以降低出错的概率。例如，通过多次重复消息并对收到的不同版本的消息进行统计研究，出错的概率可以变得非常小。然而，人们会认为，要使这个出错概率接近于零，编码的冗余度必须无限增加，因此传输速率接近于零。这绝不是真的。如果是这样，就不会有一个非常明确的容量，而只有一个给定错误频率或给定模棱两可的容量；容量随着错误频率的增加而下降错误要求变得更加严格。实际上，上面定义的容量C具有非常明确的意义。可以通过信道以速率C发送信息，并且错误或歧义的频率尽可能小，只要通过适当的编码即可。对于任何大于C 的速率，此陈述均不正确。如果尝试以高于C 的速率进行传输，例如C + R 1，则必然会出现等于或大于超出R 1 的歧义。大自然通过要求那么多的不确定性来获得回报，因此我们实际上不会正确获得超过C 的值。

It may seem surprising that we should define a definite capacity C for a noisy channel since we can never send certain information in such a case. It is clear, however, that by sending the information in a redundant form the probability of errors can be reduced. For example, by repeating the message many times and by a statistical study of the different received versions of the message the probability of errors could be made very small. One would expect, however, that to make this probability of errors approach zero, the redundancy of the encoding must increase indefinitely, and the rate of transmission therefore approach zero. This is by no means true. If it were, there would not be a very well defined capacity, but only a capacity for a given frequency of errors, or a given equivocation; the capacity going down as the error requirements are made more stringent. Actually the capacity C defined above has a very definite significance. It is possible to send information at the rate C through the channel with as small a frequency of errors or equivocation as desired by proper encoding. This statement is not true for any rate greater than C. If an attempt is made to transmit at a higher rate than C, say C + R1, then there will necessarily be an equivocation equal to or greater than the excess R1. Nature takes payment by requiring just that much uncertainty, so that we are not actually getting any more than C through correctly.

图 9显示了这种情况。水平表示进入通道的信息速率，垂直表示不确定性。阴影区域中粗线上方的任何点都可以达到，而下方的点则无法达到。线上的点一般无法达到，但通常会有两个点可以达到。

The situation is indicated in Fig. 9. The rate of information into the channel is plotted horizontally and the equivocation vertically. Any point above the heavy line in the shaded region can be attained and those below cannot. The points on the line cannot in general be attained, but there will usually be two points on the line that can.

这些结果是C定义的主要依据，现在将得到证明。

These results are the main justification for the definition of C and will now be proved.

定理 11：假设离散信道的容量为 C，离散源的每秒熵为 H。如果 H ≤ C，则存在一个编码系统，使得源的输出可以通过信道传输，且错误频率（或歧义）任意小。如果 H > C，则可以对源进行编码，使歧义小于 H — C + ∊，其中∊任意小。没有一种编码方法可以使歧义小于 H — C。

Theorem 11: Let a discrete channel have the capacity C and a discrete source the entropy per second H. If H ≤ C there exists a coding system such that the output of the source can be transmitted over the channel with an arbitrarily small frequency of errors (or an arbitrarily small equivocation). If H > C it is possible to encode the source so that the equivocation is less than H — C + ∊ where ∊ is arbitrarily small. There is no method of encoding which gives an equivocation less than H — C.

证明该定理第一部分的方法不是通过展示具有所需属性的编码方法，而是通过证明这样的代码必须存在于某一组代码中。

The method of proving the first part of this theorem is not by exhibiting a coding method having the desired properties, but by showing that such a code must exist in a certain group of codes.

图 9.—给定通道输入熵可能产生的歧义。

Fig. 9.—The equivocation possible for a given input entropy to a channel.

事实上，我们将对这个组的错误频率取平均值，并表明这个平均值可以小于∊。如果一组数字的平均值小于∊，那么该集合中必定存在至少一个小于∊的数。这将得到所需的结果。

In fact we will average the frequency of errors over this group and show that this average can be made less than ∊. If the average of a set of numbers is less than ∊ there must exist at least one in the set which is less than ∊. This will establish the desired result.

噪声信道的容量C定义为

The capacity C of a noisy channel has been defined as

C = 最大 ( H ( x ) — H y ( x ))

C = Max (H(x) — Hy(x))

其中x是输入，y是输出。最大化是针对所有可能用作通道输入的源。

where x is the input and y the output. The maximization is over all sources which might be used as input to the channel.

假设S 0是实现最大容量C的源。如果实际上没有任何源实现此最大值（而只是将其作为极限），则假设S 0是近似于提供最大速率的源。假设S 0用作信道的输入。我们考虑可能发送和接收的长持续时间T序列。以下情况将成立：

Let S0 be a source which achieves the maximum capacity C. If this maximum is not actually achieved by any source (but only approached as a limit) let S0 be a source which approximates to giving the maximum rate. Suppose S0 is used as input to the channel. We consider the possible transmitted and received sequences of a long duration T. The following will be true:

1. 传输的序列分为两类，一类是具有大约2 TH ( x )个成员的高概率序列，其余序列的总概率较小。

1. The transmitted sequences fall into two classes, a high probability group with about 2TH(x) members and the remaining sequences of small total probability.

2. 类似地，接收到的序列具有约 2 TH ( y )个成员的高概率集和剩余序列的低概率集。

2. Similarly the received sequences have a high probability set of about 2TH(y) members and a low probability set of remaining sequences.

3. 每个高概率输出可以由大约 2 TH y ( x )个输入产生。所有其他情况的总概率都很小。

3. Each high probability output could be produced by about 2THy(x) inputs. The total probability of all other cases is small.

4. 每个高概率输入可能产生约 2 TH x ( y )个输出。所有其他结果的总概率都很小。

4. Each high probability input could result in about 2THx(y) outputs. The total probability of all other results is small.

当我们允许T增加并且S 0接近最大化源时，这些语句中的“小”和“大约”一词所暗示的所有∊和δ都趋近于零。

All the ∊'s and δ's implied by the words “small” and “about” in these statements approach zero as we allow T to increase and S0 to approach the maximizing source.

图 10总结了这种情况，其中输入序列是左侧的点，输出序列是右侧的点。上方的交叉线扇形表示典型输出的可能原因范围。下方的扇形表示典型输入的可能结果范围。在这两种情况下，“小概率”集都被忽略了。

The situation is summarized in Fig. 10 where the input sequences are points on the left and output sequences points on the right. The upper fan of cross lines represents the range of possible causes for a typical output. The lower fan represents the range of possible results from a typical input. In both cases the “small probability” sets are ignored.

现在假设我们有另一个源S，以速率R产生信息，其中R < C。在周期T内，此源将有 2 TR高概率消息。我们希望将这些消息与可能的通道输入选择相关联，以获得较小的错误频率。我们将以所有可能的方式建立这种关联（但仅使用由源S 0确定的高概率输入组），并平均这一大类可能编码系统的错误频率。这与计算消息和持续时间为T 的通道输入的随机关联的错误频率相同。假设观察到特定输出y 1 。在y 1的可能原因集合中，来自S的多条消息的概率是多少？有 2 TR消息随机分布在 2 TH ( x )个点中。因此，特定点是消息的概率为

Now suppose we have another source S, producing information at rate R with R < C. In the period T this source will have 2TR high probability messages. We wish to associate these with a selection of the possible channel inputs in such a way as to get a small frequency of errors. We will set up this association in all possible ways (using, however, only the high probability group of inputs as determined by the source S0) and average the frequency of errors for this large class of possible coding systems. This is the same as calculating the frequency of errors for a random association of the messages and channel inputs of duration T. Suppose a particular output y1 is observed. What is the probability of more than one message from S in the set of possible causes of y1? There are 2TR messages distributed at random in 2TH(x) points. The probability of a particular point being a message is thus

图 10.—通道中输入和输出之间关系的示意图。

Fig. 10.—Schematic representation of the relations between inputs and outputs in a channel.

2 T ( R - H ( x ) )。

2T (R–H (x)).

扇形中的所有点都不是消息（除了实际的原始消息）的概率是

The probability that none of the points in the fan is a message (apart from the actual originating message) is

P = [ 1-2T （ R - H（x））] 2THy （ x ）。

P = [1 — 2T (R — H(x))]2THy(x).

现在R < H ( x ) — H y ( x )，因此R — H ( x ) = — H y ( x ) — η，其中η为正。因此

Now R < H(x) — Hy(x) so R — H(x) = — Hy(x) — η with η positive. Consequently

P = [ 1 — 2 – THy ( x ) – Tη ] 2 THy ( x )

P = [1 — 2–THy(x)–Tη]2THy(x)

趋近（当T → ∞ 时）

approaches (as T → ∞)

1 — 2 -Tη。

1 — 2-Tη.

因此，错误的概率趋近于零，定理的第一部分得到证明。

Hence the probability of an error approaches zero and the first part of the theorem is proved.

定理的第二部分很容易证明，只要注意到我们每秒只能从源发送C比特，完全忽略生成的其余信息即可。在接收方，忽略的部分给出一个等价函数H ( x ) — C，而传输的部分只需添加∊。这个极限也可以通过许多其他方式实现，正如我们在考虑连续情况时所展示的那样。

The second part of the theorem is easily shown by noting that we could merely send C bits per second from the source, completely neglecting the remainder of the information generated. At the receiver the neglected part gives an equivocation H(x) — C and the part transmitted need only add ∊. This limit can also be attained in many other ways, as will be shown when we consider the continuous case.

定理的最后一条陈述是我们对C的定义的简单推论。假设我们可以用H ( x ) = C + a编码源，从而得到一个等价H y ( x ) = a — ∊且∊为正。那么

The last statement of the theorem is a simple consequence of our definition of C. Suppose we can encode a source with H(x) = C + a in such a way as to obtain an equivocation Hy(x) = a — ∊ with ∊ positive. Then

H ( x ) — Hy ( x ) = C + ∊

H(x) — Hy(x) = C + ∊

其中∊为正。这与C为H ( x )—Hy ( x )的最大值的定义相矛盾。

with ∊ positive. This contradicts the definition of C as the maximum of H(x) — Hy(x).

实际上，已证明的内容比定理中所述的要多。如果一组正数的平均值在零的∊以内，则最多有 的分数可以具有大于 的值。由于∊任意小，我们可以说几乎所有系统都任意接近理想值。

Actually more has been proved than was stated in the theorem. If the average of a set of positive numbers is within ∊ of zero, a fraction of at most can have values greater than . Since ∊ is arbitrarily small we can say that almost all the systems are arbitrarily close to the ideal.

14.讨论

14. Discussion

定理 11的证明虽然不是纯粹的存在性证明，但具有此类证明的一些缺陷。试图按照证明方法获得理想编码的良好近似值通常是不切实际的。事实上，除了一些相当琐碎的情况和某些限制情况外，还没有发现对理想近似的一系列明确描述。这可能不是偶然的，而是与难以给出随机序列的良好近似的明确构造。

The demonstration of Theorem 11, while not a pure existence proof, has some of the deficiencies of such proofs. An attempt to obtain a good approximation to ideal coding by following the method of the proof is generally impractical. In fact, apart from some rather trivial cases and certain limiting situations, no explicit description of a series of approximation to the ideal has been found. Probably this is no accident but is related to the difficulty of giving an explicit construction for a good approximation to a random sequence.

理想情况的近似值具有这样的特性：如果信号因噪声而以合理的方式改变，则原始信号仍可恢复。换句话说，这种改变通常不会使其更接近另一个合理信号而不是原始信号。这是以编码中一定量的冗余为代价实现的。必须以适当的方式引入冗余以对抗所涉及的特定噪声结构。但是，如果在接收点使用源中的任何冗余，通常都会有所帮助。特别是，如果源已经具有一定的冗余，并且在与信道匹配时没有尝试消除它，则这种冗余将有助于对抗噪声。例如，在无噪声的电报信道中，通过对消息进行适当的编码可以节省大约 50% 的时间。这并没有做到，英语的大部分冗余仍然保留在信道符号中。然而，这样做的好处是允许信道中存在相当大的噪声。相当一部分字母可能会被错误接收，但仍可通过上下文重建。事实上，在很多情况下，这可能并不是一个糟糕的理想近似值，因为英语的统计结构相当复杂，并且合理的英语序列与随机选择相差不远（在定理所要求的意义上）。

An approximation to the ideal would have the property that if the signal is altered in a reasonable way by the noise, the original can still be recovered. In other words the alteration will not in general bring it closer to another reasonable signal than the original. This is accomplished at the cost of a certain amount of redundancy in the coding. The redundancy must be introduced in the proper way to combat the particular noise structure involved. However, any redundancy in the source will usually help if it is utilized at the receiving point. In particular, if the source already has a certain redundancy and no attempt is made to eliminate it in matching to the channel, this redundancy will help combat noise. For example, in a noiseless telegraph channel one could save about 50% in time by proper encoding of the messages. This is not done and most of the redundancy of English remains in the channel symbols. This has the advantage, however, of allowing considerable noise in the channel. A sizable fraction of the letters can be received incorrectly and still reconstructed by the context. In fact this is probably not a bad approximation to the ideal in many cases, since the statistical structure of English is rather involved and the reasonable English sequences are not too far (in the sense required for the theorem) from a random selection.

与无噪声情况一样，通常需要延迟才能接近理想编码。现在它具有额外的功能，即在接收点对原始消息做出任何判断之前，允许大量噪声样本影响信号。增加样本量总是会增强可能的统计断言。

As in the noiseless case a delay is generally required to approach the ideal encoding. It now has the additional function of allowing a large sample of noise to affect the signal before any judgment is made at the receiving point as to the original message. Increasing the sample size always sharpens the possible statistical assertions.

定理 11的内容及其证明可以用一种略有不同的方式表述，这种方式可以更清楚地展示与无噪声情况的联系。考虑持续时间为T 的可能信号，并假设选择使用其中的一个子集。让子集中的所有信号都以相等的概率使用，并假设接收器的构造使其在接收到扰动信号时从子集中选择最可能的原因作为原始信号。我们将N ( T, q ) 定义为信号的最大数量我们可以选择子集，使得错误解释的概率小于或等于q。

The content of Theorem 11 and its proof can be formulated in a somewhat different way which exhibits the connection with the noiseless case more clearly. Consider the possible signals of duration T and suppose a subset of them is selected to be used. Let those in the subset all be used with equal probability, and suppose the receiver is constructed to select, as the original signal, the most probable cause from the subset, when a perturbed signal is received. We define N(T, q) to be the maximum number of signals we can choose for the subset such that the probability of an incorrect interpretation is less than or equal to q.

定理12：， 其中C是信道容量，前提是q不等于0或1。

Theorem 12: , where C is the channel capacity, provided that q does not equal 0 or 1.

换句话说，无论我们如何设定可靠性的极限，当T足够大时，我们都可以在时间T内可靠地区分足够多的消息，这些消息对应于大约CT位。定理 12可以与第 1 节中给出的无噪声信道容量定义进行比较。

In other words, no matter how we set our limits of reliability, we can distinguish reliably in time T enough messages to correspond to about CT bits, when T is sufficiently large. Theorem 12 can be compared with the definition of the capacity of a noiseless channel given in section 1.

15.离散信道及其容量的示例

15. Example of a Discrete Channel and Its Capacity

图 11显示了离散信道的一个简单示例。有三个可能的符号。第一个符号永远不会受到噪声的影响。第二个和第三个符号不受干扰的概率分别为p ，变为另一对符号的概率分别为q 。设α = — [ p log p + q log q ]，设P、Q和Q分别为使用第一个、第二个和第三个符号的概率（考虑到对称性，后两个符号相等）。我们有：

A simple example of a discrete channel is indicated in Fig. 11. There are three possible symbols. The first is never affected by noise. The second and third each have probability p of coming through undisturbed, and q of being changed into the other of the pair. Let α = — [p log p + q log q] and let P, Q and Q be the probabilities of using the first, second and third symbols respectively (the last two being equal from consideration of symmetry). We have:

图 11.—离散通道的示例。

Fig. 11.—Example of a discrete channel.

H（x）= — P log P — 2 Q log Q
H(x) = — P log P — 2Q log Q
H y ( x ) = 2 Qα。
Hy(x) = 2Qα.

我们希望以最大化H ( x ) — H y ( x )的方式选择P和Q，但要满足约束P + 2 Q = 1。因此，我们考虑

We wish to choose P and Q in such a way as to maximize H(x) — Hy(x), subject to the constraint P + 2Q = 1. Hence we consider

消除λ

Eliminating λ

信道容量为

The channel capacity is then

请注意，在p = 1 和p = 的情况下，这如何检查明显的值。在第一种情况下，β = 1 和C = log 3，这是正确的，因为信道是无噪声的，有三个可能的符号。如果p = ，β = 2 和C = log 2。这里第二个和第三个符号根本无法区分，并且像一个符号一样一起起作用。第一个符号的使用概率为P = ，第二个和第三个符号一起使用的概率为。这可以以任何所需的方式在它们之间分配，并且仍能实现最大容量。

Note how this checks the obvious values in the cases p = 1 and p = . In the first, β = 1 and C = log 3, which is correct since the channel is then noiseless with three possible symbols. If p = , β = 2 and C = log 2. Here the second and third symbols cannot be distinguished at all and act together like one symbol. The first symbol is used with probability P = and the second and third together with probability .This may be distributed between them in any desired way and still achieve the maximum capacity.

对于p的中间值，信道容量将介于 log 2 和 log 3 之间。第二个和第三个符号之间的区别传达了一些信息，但不如无噪声情况下那么多。第一个符号的使用频率略高于其他两个符号，因为它不受噪声影响。

For intermediate values of p the channel capacity will lie between log 2 and log 3. The distinction between the second and third symbols conveys some information but not as much as in the noiseless case. The first symbol is used somewhat more frequently than the other two because of its freedom from noise.

16. 某些特殊情况下的信道容量

16. The Channel Capacity in Certain Special Cases

如果噪声独立地影响连续的信道符号，则可以用一组转移概率p ij来描述。这是如果发送符号i ，则接收符号j 的概率。信道容量由以下最大值给出

If the noise affects successive channel symbols independently it can be described by a set of transition probabilities pij. This is the probability, if symbol i is sent, that j will be received. The channel capacity is then given by the maximum of

其中，我们改变P i以 Σ P i = 1 为条件。这通过拉格朗日方法得到以下方程：

where we vary the Pi subject to ΣPi = 1. This leads by the method of Lagrange to the equations,

乘以P s并对s求和可得出μ = — C 。设p sj的逆（如果存在）为h st ，则。然后：

Multiplying by Ps and summing on s shows that μ = — C. Let the inverse of psj (if it exists) be hst so that . Then:

因此：

Hence:

或者，

or,

这是用于确定P i的最大值的方程组，其中C需要确定以便 Σ P i = 1。完成此操作后，C将成为信道容量，而P i将成为信道符号实现此容量的适当概率。

This is the system of equations for determining the maximizing values of Pi, with C to be determined so that ΣPi = 1. When this is done C will be the channel capacity, and the Pi the proper probabilities for the channel symbols to achieve this capacity.

如果每个输入符号在从其发出的线路上具有相同的概率集，并且每个输出符号也是如此，则可以轻松计算容量。图 12显示了示例。在这种情况下，H x ( y ) 与输入符号上的概率分布无关，并由 — Σ p i log p i给出，其中p i是来自任何输入符号的转移概率值。信道容量为

If each input symbol has the same set of probabilities on the lines emerging from it, and the same is true of each output symbol, the capacity can be easily calculated. Examples are shown in Fig. 12. In such a case Hx(y) is independent of the distribution of probabilities on the input symbols, and is given by — Σ pi log pi where the pi are the values of the transition probabilities from any input symbol. The channel capacity is

图 12.—每个输入和每个输出具有相同转换概率的离散通道示例。

Fig. 12.—Examples of discrete channels with the same transition probabilities for each input and for each output.

最大值 [ H ( y ) — Hx ( y ) ]

Max [H(y) — Hx(y)]

= 最大H ( y ) + Σ p i log p i。
= Max H(y) + Σ pi log pi.

H ( y )的最大值显然是 log m，其中m是输出符号的数量，因为可以通过使输入符号具有同等概率来使它们都具有同等概率。因此，信道容量为

The maximum of H(y) is clearly log m where m is the number of output symbols, since it is possible to make them all equally probable by making the input symbols equally probable. The channel capacity is therefore

C = logm + ∑pilogpi。​​​​

C = log m + Σ pi log pi.

在图 12a中

In Fig. 12a it would be

C = log 4 — log 2 = log 2。

C = log 4 — log 2 = log 2.

这可以通过仅使用第 1 个和第 3 个符号来实现。在图 12b中

This could be achieved by using only the 1st and 3d symbols. In Fig. 12b

在图 12c中，我们有

In Fig. 12c we have

假设符号分为几组，噪声永远不会导致一组中的符号被误认为另一组中的符号。当我们只使用第 n组中的符号时，让该组的容量为C n （以比特/秒为单位）。然后很容易证明，为了最佳地使用整个集合，第n组中所有符号的总概率P n应该是

Suppose the symbols fall into several groups such that the noise never causes a symbol in one group to be mistaken for a symbol in another group. Let the capacity for the nth group be Cn (in bits per second) when we use only the symbols in this group. Then it is easily shown that, for best use of the entire set, the total probability Pn of all symbols in the nth group should be

在一个组内，概率的分布就像这些是唯一被使用的符号一样。信道容量是

Within a group the probability is distributed just as it would be if these were the only symbols being used. The channel capacity is

C = log Σ2Cn 。

C = log Σ2Cn.

17.高效编码示例

17. An Example of Efficient Coding

下面的例子虽然有些不自然，但却是可以精确匹配噪声信道的情况。有两个信道符号 0 和 1，噪声以 7 个符号块的形式影响它们。7 个符号块要么无错误地传输，要么 7 个符号中只有一个符号不正确。这 8 种可能性是相等的。我们有

The following example, although somewhat artificial, is a case in which exact matching to a noisy channel is possible. There are two channel symbols, 0 and 1, and the noise affects them in blocks of seven symbols. A block of seven is either transmitted without error, or exactly one symbol of the seven is incorrect. These eight possibilities are equally likely. We have

一种有效的代码，允许完全纠正错误并以速率C进行传输，如下所示（通过 R. Hamming 的方法发现）：

An efficient code, allowing complete correction of errors and transmitting at the rate C, is the following (found by a method due to R. Hamming) :

假设一个包含 7 个符号的块为X 1 X 2 ,…, X 7。其中X 3、X 5、X 6和X 7是消息符号，由源任意选择。其他三个是冗余的，计算如下：

Let a block of seven symbols be X1 X2,…, X7. Of these X3, X5, X6 and X7 are message symbols and chosen arbitrarily by the source. The other three are redundant and calculated as follows:

当收到一个七块时，计算α、β和γ ，如果是偶数，则称为零，如果是奇数，则称为一。二进制数α β γ给出不正确的X i的下标（如果为 0，则没有错误） 。10

When a block of seven is received α, β and γ are calculated and if even called zero, if odd called one. The binary number α β γ then gives the subscript of the Xi that is incorrect (if 0 there was no error) .10

10有关自校正码的更多示例，请参阅 MJE Golay 的《数字编码注释》，《无线电工程师学会会刊，第 37 卷，第 6 期，1949 年 6 月，第 637 页。

10 For some further examples of self-correcting codes see M. J. E. Golay, “Notes on Digital Coding,” Proceedings of the Institute of Radio Engineers, v. 37, No. 6, June, 1949, p. 637.

三

III

持续信息

Continuous Information

现在我们考虑信号或消息或两者都连续变化的情况，这与此前假设的离散性质相反。在很大程度上，可以通过从离散情况进行限制过程来获得连续情况，即将消息和信号的连续体划分为大量但有限数量的小区域，并计算离散基础上所涉及的各种参数。随着区域大小的减小，这些参数通常接近连续情况的适当值极限。然而，出现了一些新的影响，并且重点也普遍转向将一般结果专门化到特定情况。

We now consider the case where the signals or the messages or both are continuously variable, in contrast with the discrete nature assumed heretofore. To a considerable extent the continuous case can be obtained through a limiting process from the discrete case by dividing the continuum of messages and signals into a large but finite number of small regions and calculating the various parameters involved on a discrete basis. As the size of the regions is decreased these parameters in general approach as limits the proper values for the continuous case. There are, however, a few new effects that appear and also a general change of emphasis in the direction of specialization of the general results to particular cases.

在连续情况下，我们不会试图以最普遍的方式或纯数学的极端严谨性来获得我们的结果，因为这将涉及大量抽象测度理论，并会模糊分析的主线。然而，初步研究表明，该理论可以以完全公理化和严格的方式制定，包括连续和离散情况以及许多其他情况。在所有具有实际意义的情况下，本分析中对限制过程的偶尔随意处理都是合理的。

We will not attempt, in the continuous case, to obtain our results with the greatest generality, or with the extreme rigor of pure mathematics, since this would involve a great deal of abstract measure theory and would obscure the main thread of the analysis. A preliminary study, however, indicates that the theory can be formulated in a completely axiomatic and rigorous manner which includes both the continuous and discrete cases and many others. The occasional liberties taken with limiting processes in the present analysis can be justified in all cases of practical interest.

18. 函数集和集合

18. Sets and Ensembles of Functions

在连续情况下，我们必须处理函数集和函数集合。顾名思义，函数集只是一类或一组函数，通常只有一个变量，即时间。可以通过给出集合中各个函数的明确表示来指定它，也可以通过给出集合中的函数具有而其他函数不具有的属性来隐式指定它。以下是一些示例：

We shall have to deal in the continuous case with sets of functions and ensembles of functions. A set of functions, as the name implies, is merely a class or collection of functions, generally of one variable, time. It can be specified by giving an explicit representation of the various functions in the set, or implicitly by giving a property which functions in the set possess and others do not. Some examples are:

 
  1. 函数集：
    fθ ( t )=sin( t + θ )。
    θ的每个特定值决定集合中的一个特定函数。
  2. The set of functions:
    fθ(t) = sin (t + θ).
    Each particular value of θ determines a particular function in the set.
  3. 不包含每秒W个周期以上频率的所有时间函数的集合。
  4. The set of all functions of time containing no frequencies over W cycles per second.
  5. 带宽限制为W且振幅限制为A的所有函数的集合。
  6. The set of all functions limited in band to W and in amplitude to A.
  7. 所有英语语音信号的集合都是时间的函数。
  8. The set of all English speech signals as functions of time.

函数集合是一组函数加上一个概率测度，通过该测度，我们可以确定集合中某个函数具有某些属性的概率。1例如，对于集合，

An ensemble of functions is a set of functions together with a probability measure whereby we may determine the probability of a function in the set having certain properties.1 For example with the set,

fθ ( t )=sin( t + θ )，

fθ(t) = sin (t + θ),

我们可以给出θ的概率分布，比如P ( θ )。然后这个集合就变成了一个整体。

we may give a probability distribution for θ, say P(θ). The set then becomes an ensemble.

函数集合的一些进一步的例子是：

Some further examples of ensembles of functions are:

 
  1. 一组有限函数f k ( t ) ( k = 1, 2,…, n )，其中f k为p k的概率。
  2. A finite set of functions fk(t) (k = 1, 2,…, n) with the probability of fk being pk.
  3. 有限维函数族
    f ( α 1 , α 2 ,…, α n ; t )
    参数α i 的概率分布为：
    p（α1，… ，αn ）。
    例如，我们可以考虑由以下定义的集合
    其中振幅a i服从正态分布且独立，相位θ i服从均匀分布（从 0 到 2 π）且独立。
  4. A finite dimensional family of functions
    f(α1, α2,…, αn; t)
    with a probability distribution for the parameters αi:
    p(α1,…, αn).
    For example we could consider the ensemble defined by
    with the amplitudes ai distributed normally and independently, and the phases θi distributed uniformly (from 0 to 2π) and independently.
  5. 合奏
    其中a i为正常且独立的，且均具有相同的标准差。这是“白”噪声的表示，频带限制在每秒 0 到W 个周期的频带内，平均功率为N。2
  6. The ensemble
    with the ai normal and independent all with the same standard deviation . This is a representation of “white” noise, band limited to the band from 0 to W cycles per second and with average power N.2
  7. 让点按照泊松分布分布在t轴上。在每个选定的点上放置函数f ( t )，并添加不同的函数，得到集合
    其中t k是泊松分布的点。该集合可视为一种脉冲或散粒噪声，其中所有脉冲都是相同的。
  8. Let points be distributed on the t axis according to a Poisson distribution. At each selected point the function f(t) is placed and the different functions added, giving the ensemble
    where the tk are the points of the Poisson distribution. This ensemble can be considered as a type of impulse or shot noise where all the impulses are identical.
  9. 一组英语语音函数，其概率测度由日常使用中的出现频率给出。
  10. The set of English speech functions with the probability measure given by the frequency of occurrence in ordinary use.

如果当所有函数随时间平移任意固定量时，结果仍为同一集合，则函数集合f α ( t ) 为平稳函数。集合

An ensemble of functions fα(t) is stationary if the same ensemble results when all functions are shifted any fixed amount in time. The ensemble

fθ ( t )=sin ( t + θ )

fθ(t) = sin (t + θ)

如果θ服从 0 到 2 π的均匀分布，则为平稳函数。如果我们将每个函数平移t 1，则得到

is stationary if θ is distributed uniformly from 0 to 2π. If we shift each function by t1 we obtain

f θ ( t + t 1 ) = sin ( t + t 1 + θ )

fθ(t + t1) = sin (t + t1 + θ)

       = 罪（t + φ）

       = sin (t + φ)

其中φ均匀分布在 0 到 2 π之间。每个函数都发生了变化，但整体在平移下保持不变。上面给出的其他例子也是平稳的。

with φ distributed uniformly from 0 to 2π. Each function has changed but the ensemble as a whole is invariant under the translation. The other examples given above are also stationary.

如果集合是平稳的，并且集合中不存在概率不为 0 和 1 的函数子集，则集合是遍历的。集合

An ensemble is ergodic if it is stationary, and there is no subset of the functions in the set with a probability different from 0 and 1 which is stationary. The ensemble

罪（t + θ）

sin (t + θ)

是遍历的。这些概率 ≠ 0, 1 的函数中没有一个子集在所有时间平移下变换为自身。另一方面，集合

is ergodic. No subset of these functions of probability ≠ 0, 1 is transformed into itself under all time translations. On the other hand the ensemble

正弦（t + θ）

a sin (t + θ)

具有正态分布且θ均匀分布的函数是平稳的但不是遍历的。例如，这些函数中a介于0和1之间的子集是平稳的，并且具有不等于0或1的概率。

with a distributed normally and θ uniform is stationary but not ergodic. The subset of these functions with a between 0 and 1, for example, is stationary, and has a probability not equal to 0 or 1.

在给出的例子中，3 和 4 是遍历的，5 或许也可以这样认为。如果一个集合是遍历的，我们可以粗略地说集合中的每个函数都是该集合的典型函数。更准确地说，众所周知，对于遍历集合，集合上任何统计量的平均值等于（概率为 1）集合中特定函数所有时间平移的平均值。3粗略地说，随着时间的推移，每个函数都可以预期以适当的频率经历集合中任何函数的所有卷积。

Of the examples given, 3 and 4 are ergodic, and 5 may perhaps be considered so. If an ensemble is ergodic we may say roughly that each function in the set is typical of the ensemble. More precisely it is known that with an ergodic ensemble an average of any statistic over the ensemble is equal (with probability 1) to an average over all the time translations of a particular function in the set.3 Roughly speaking, each function can be expected, as time progresses, to go through, with the proper frequency, all the convolutions of any of the functions in the set.

正如我们可以对数字或函数进行各种运算来获得新的数字或函数一样，我们也可以对集合进行运算来获得新的集合。例如，假设我们有一个函数集合f α ( t ) 和一个算子T，它为每个函数f α ( t ) 给出一个结果函数g α ( t ) ：

Just as we may perform various operations on numbers or functions to obtain new numbers or functions, we can perform operations on ensembles to obtain new ensembles. Suppose, for example, we have an ensemble of functions fα(t) and an operator T which gives for each function fα(t) a resulting function gα(t) :

gα ( t ) = Tfα ( t )。

gα(t) = Tfα(t).

概率测度是通过集合 f α ( t ) 的概率测度来定义的。g α ( t ) 函数的某个子集的概率等于 f α ( t )函数子集的概率，该子集在运算 T下产生给定 g 函数子集的成员。从物理上讲，这相当于将集合通过某个设备，例如滤波器、整流器或调制器。设备的输出函数构成集合g α ( t )。

Probability measure is defined for the set gα(t) by means of that for the set fα(t). The probability of a certain subset of the gα(t) functions is equal to that of the subset of the fα(t) functions which produce members of the given subset of g functions under the operation T. Physically this corresponds to passing the ensemble through some device, for example, a filter, a rectifier or a modulator. The output functions of the device form the ensemble gα(t).

如果输入的移动仅仅会导致输出的移动，即，如果

A device or operator T will be called invariant if shifting the input merely shifts the output, i.e., if

gα ( t ) = Tfα ( t )。

gα(t) = Tfα(t).

暗示

implies

gα（t + t1）= Tfα（t + t1 ）​​​

gα(t + t1) = Tfα(t + t1)

对于所有f α ( t ) 和所有t 1。很容易证明（参见附录 5），如果T不变且输入集合是平稳的，则输出集合也是平稳的。同样，如果输入是遍历的，则输出也将是遍历的。

for all fα(t) and all t1. It is easily shown (see Appendix 5) that if T is invariant and the input ensemble is stationary then the output ensemble is stationary. Likewise if the input is ergodic the output will also be ergodic.

滤波器或整流器在所有时间平移下都是不变的。调制操作则不然，因为载波相位给出了一定的时间结构。但是，调制在所有为载波周期倍数的平移下都是不变的。

A filter or a rectifier is invariant under all time translations. The operation of modulation is not, since the carrier phase gives a certain time structure. However, modulation is invariant under all translations which are multiples of the period of the carrier.

维纳指出了物理设备在时间平移下的不变性和傅里叶理论之间的密切关系。4事实上，他已经证明，如果设备是线性的，并且不变，那么傅里叶分析就是处理该问题的合适数学工具。

Wiener has pointed out the intimate relation between the invariance of physical devices under time translations and Fourier theory.4 He has shown, in fact, that if a device is linear as well as invariant Fourier analysis is then the appropriate mathematical tool for dealing with the problem.

函数集合是连续源（例如语音）产生的消息、发射器产生的信号和扰动噪声的适当数学表示。通信理论是正如维纳所强调的，语音系统关注的不是特定函数上的运算，而是函数集合上的运算。通信系统不是为特定的语音函数设计的，更不是为正弦波设计的，而是为语音函数集合设计的。

An ensemble of functions is the appropriate mathematical representation of the messages produced by a continuous source (for example, speech), of the signals produced by a transmitter, and of the perturbing noise. Communication theory is properly concerned, as has been emphasized by Wiener, not with operations on particular functions, but with operations on ensembles of functions. A communication system is designed not for a particular speech function and still less for a sine wave, but for the ensemble of speech functions.

19. 带限函数集合

19. Band Limited Ensembles of Functions

如果时间函数f ( t ) 被限制在每秒 0 到W个周期的范围内，则可以完全通过在一系列相隔数秒的离散点上给出其纵坐标来确定它，方式如下文结果所示。5

If a function of time f(t) is limited to the band from 0 to W cycles per second it is completely determined by giving its ordinates at a series of discrete points spaced seconds apart in the manner indicated by the following result.5

定理 13：设 f ( t )不包含 W 上的频率。

Theorem 13: Let f(t) contain no frequencies over W.

然后

Then

在哪里

where

在这个展开式中，f ( t ) 表示为正交函数的和。各项系数X n可视为无限维“函数空间”中的坐标。在这个空间中，每个函数恰好对应一个点，每个点对应一个函数。

In this expansion f(t) is represented as a sum of orthogonal functions. The coefficients Xn of the various terms can be considered as coordinates in an infinite dimensional “function space.” In this space each function corresponds to precisely one point and each point to one function.

如果该时间间隔之外的所有坐标X n均为零，则可以认为函数基本限于时间T。在这种情况下，除 2 TW之外的所有坐标都将为零。因此，限于频带W和持续时间T的函数对应于 2 TW维空间中的点。

A function can be considered to be substantially limited to a time T if all the ordinates Xn outside this interval of time are zero. In this case all but 2TW of the coordinates will be zero. Thus functions limited to a band W and duration T correspond to points in a space of 2TW dimensions.

频带为W、持续时间为T的函数子集对应该空间中的一个区域。例如，总能量小于或等于E的函数对应于半径为 的2 TW维球体中的点。

A subset of the functions of band W and duration T corresponds to a region in this space. For example, the functions whose total energy is less than or equal to E correspond to points in a 2TW dimensional sphere with radius .

一系列限时活动和乐队将由相应n维空间中的概率分布p ( x 1 ,…, x n ) 表示。如果集合不受时间限制，我们可以认为给定间隔T中的 2 TW坐标基本上表示间隔T中的函数部分，概率分布p ( x 1 ,…, x n ) 给出该持续时间间隔的集合的统计结构。

An ensemble of functions of limited duration and band will be represented by a probability distribution p(x1,…, xn) in the corresponding n dimensional space. If the ensemble is not limited in time we can consider the 2TW coordinates in a given interval T to represent substantially the part of the function in the interval T and the probability distribution p(x1,…, xn) to give the statistical structure of the ensemble for intervals of that duration.

20.连续分布的熵

20. Entropy of a Continuous Distribution

离散概率集p 1 ,…, p n的熵定义为：

The entropy of a discrete set of probabilities p1,…, pn has been defined as:

H = — ∑pilogpi 。​​​

H = — Σ pi log pi.

以类似的方式，我们用密度分布函数p ( x )定义连续分布的熵为：

In an analogous manner we define the entropy of a continuous distribution with the density distribution function p(x) by:

对于n维分布p ( x 1 ,…, x n )，我们有

With an n dimensional distribution p(x1,…, xn) we have

如果我们有两个参数x和y （它们本身可能是多维的），则p ( x, y )的联合熵和条件熵由下式给出：

If we have two arguments x and y (which may themselves be multidimensional) the joint and conditional entropies of p(x, y) are given by

和

and

在哪里

where

连续分布的熵具有大多数（但不是全部）离散情况的性质。具体来说，我们有以下内容：

The entropies of continuous distributions have most (but not all) of the properties of the discrete case. In particular we have the following:

  1. 如果x限制在其空间中的某个体积v内，则当p ( x )在该体积中为常数时，H ( x ) 最大且等于 log v 。
  2. If x is limited to a certain volume v in its space, then H(x) is a maximum and equal to log v when p(x) is constant in the volume.
  3. 对于任意两个变量x, y，我们有
    H（x，y）≤H （ x ） + H（y）
    当（且仅当） x和y独立时，即p ( x , y ) = p ( x ) p ( y ) （可能与概率为零的点集分开），则相等。
  4. With any two variables x, y we have
    H(x, y) ≤ H(x) + H(y)
    with equality if (and only if) x and y are independent, i.e., p(x, y) = p(x) p(y) (apart possibly from a set of points of probability zero).
  5. 考虑以下类型的广义平均运算：
    和
    然后平均分布p ′( y )的熵等于或大于原始分布p ( x ) 的熵。
  6. Consider a generalized averaging operation of the following type:
    with
    Then the entropy of the averaged distribution p′(y) is equal to or greater than that of the original distribution p(x).
  7. 我们有
    H（x，y）= H（x）+ H x（y）= H（y）+ H y（x）
    和
    Hx ( y ) ≤H ( y ) 。
  8. We have
    H(x, y) = H(x) + Hx(y) = H(y) + Hy(x)
    and
    Hx(y) ≤ H(y).
  9. 假设p ( x ) 为一维分布。当x的标准差固定为σ时， p ( x ) 给出最大熵的形式为高斯分布。为了证明这一点，我们必须最大化
    和
    作为约束。这需要通过变分法最大化
    条件是
    — 1 — log p ( x ) + λ x 2 + μ = 0
    因此（调整常数以满足约束）
    类似地，在n维中，假设p ( x 1 ,…, x n )的二阶矩固定在A ij处：
    然后，当p ( x 1 …, x n ) 为具有二阶矩A ij的n维高斯分布时，出现最大熵（通过类似的计算）。
  10. Let p(x) be a one-dimensional distribution. The form of p(x) giving a maximum entropy subject to the condition that the standard deviation of x be fixed at σ is Gaussian. To show this we must maximize
    with
    as constraints. This requires, by the calculus of variations, maximizing
    The condition for this is
    — 1 — log p(x) + λx2 + μ = 0
    and consequently (adjusting the constants to satisfy the constraints)
    Similarly in n dimensions, suppose the second order moments of p(x1,…, xn) are fixed at Aij:
    Then the maximum entropy occurs (by a similar calculation) when p(x1…, xn) is the n dimensional Gaussian distribution with the second order moments Aij.
  11. 标准差为σ的一维高斯分布的熵由下式给出
    计算方法如下：
    类似地，具有相关二次型a ij的n维高斯分布由以下公式给出
    熵可以计算为
    其中 | a ij | 是行列式，其元素为a ij。
  12. The entropy of a one-dimensional Gaussian distribution whose standard deviation is σ is given by
    This is calculated as follows:
    Similarly the n dimensional Gaussian distribution with associated quadratic form aij is given by
    and the entropy can be calculated as
    where | aij | is the determinant whose elements are aij.
  13. 如果x被限制为半直线（当x ≤ 0 时， p ( x ) = 0 ）并且x的一阶矩固定在a 处：
    那么最大熵发生在
    且等于 log ea。
  14. If x is limited to a half line (p(x) = 0 for x ≤ 0) and the first moment of x is fixed at a:
    then the maximum entropy occurs when
    and is equal to log ea.
  15. 连续熵和离散熵之间有一个重要的区别。在离散情况下，熵以绝对方式衡量机会变量的随机性。在连续情况下，测量是相对于坐标系的。如果我们改变坐标，熵通常会改变。事实上，如果我们改变坐标y 1 … y n，新的熵由以下公式给出
    其中J 是坐标变换的雅可比矩阵。展开对数并将变量更改为x 1 … x n，我们得到：
    因此，新熵等于旧熵减去雅可比矩阵的期望对数。在连续情况下，熵可以被视为相对于假定标准的随机性度量，即所选坐标系中每个小体积元素dx 1 ... dx n被赋予相等权重。当我们改变坐标系时，新系统中的熵衡量的是当新系统中相等体积元素dy 1 ... dy n被赋予相等权重时的随机性。
    尽管依赖于坐标系，熵的概念在连续情况下和离散情况下同样重要。这是因为信息速率和信道容量的导出概念取决于两个熵的差异，而这种差异不依赖于坐标系，这两个术语中的每一个都发生了相同的变化。
    连续分布的熵可以是负数。测量尺度设定一个任意零点，对应于单位体积上的均匀分布。比这更受限制的分布具有较少的熵，并且将为负数。但是，速率和容量将始终为非负数。
  16. There is one important difference between the continuous and discrete entropies. In the discrete case the entropy measures in an absolute way the randomness of the chance variable. In the continuous case the measurement is relative to the coordinate system. If we change coordinates the entropy will in general change. In fact if we change to coordinates y1…yn the new entropy is given by
    where J is the Jacobian of the coordinate transformation. On expanding the logarithm and changing variables to x1…xn, we obtain:
    Thus the new entropy is the old entropy less the expected logarithm of the Jacobian. In the continuous case the entropy can be considered a measure of randomness relative to an assumed standard, namely the coordinate system chosen with each small volume element dx1…dxn given equal weight. When we change the coordinate system the entropy in the new system measures the randomness when equal volume elements dy1…dyn in the new system are given equal weight.
    In spite of this dependence on the coordinate system the entropy concept is as important in the continuous case as the discrete case. This is due to the fact that the derived concepts of information rate and channel capacity depend on the difference of two entropies and this difference does not depend on the coordinate frame, each of the two terms being changed by the same amount.
    The entropy of a continuous distribution can be negative. The scale of measurements sets an arbitrary zero corresponding to a uniform distribution over a unit volume. A distribution which is more confined than this has less entropy and will be negative. The rates and capacities will, however, always be non-negative.
  17. 改变坐标的一个特殊情况是线性变换
    在这种情况下，雅可比矩阵只是行列式 | a ij | -1和
    H（y）= H（x）+ log | a ij |。
    对于坐标旋转（或任何保持测度的变换）的情况，J = 1 且H ( y ) = H ( x )。
  18. A particular case of changing coordinates is the linear transformation
    In this case the Jacobian is simply the determinant | aij |-1 and
    H(y) = H(x) + log | aij |.
    In the case of a rotation of coordinates (or any measure preserving transformation) J = 1 and H (y) = H(x).

21. 函数集合的熵

21. Entropy of an Ensemble of Functions

考虑一个遍历函数集合，其宽度限制在每秒W个周期的特定带宽内。设

Consider an ergodic ensemble of functions limited to a certain band of width W cycles per second. Let

p（x1，… ， xn ）

p(x1,…, xn)

是n 个连续采样点处振幅x 1 … x n 的密度分布函数。我们定义每个自由度的集合熵为

be the density distribution function for amplitudes x1…xn at n successive sample points. We define the entropy of the ensemble per degree of freedom by

我们也可以通过除以n 个样本的时间T（以秒为单位）来定义每秒的熵H ，而不是除以n 。由于n = 2 TW，因此 H = 2 WH ′。

We may also define an entropy H per second by dividing, not by n, but by the time T in seconds for n samples. Since n = 2TW, H = 2WH′.

当白热噪声p服从高斯分布时，我们有

With white thermal noise p is Gaussian and we have

对于给定的平均功率N，白噪声具有最大可能的熵。这是根据上述高斯分布的最大化特性得出的。

For a given average power N, white noise has the maximum possible entropy. This follows from the maximizing properties of the Gaussian distribution noted above.

连续随机过程的熵具有许多与离散过程类似的属性。在离散情况下，熵与长序列概率的对数以及合理可能的长序列数量相关。在连续情况下，它以类似的方式与长序列样本概率密度的对数以及函数空间中合理高概率的体积相关。

The entropy for a continuous stochastic process has many properties analogous to that for discrete processes. In the discrete case the entropy was related to the logarithm of the probability of long sequences, and to the number of reasonably probable sequences of long length. In the continuous case it is related in a similar fashion to the logarithm of the probability density for a long series of samples, and the volume of reasonably high probability in the function space.

更准确地说，如果我们假设p ( x 1 ,…, x n ) 对所有n的所有x i连续，那么对于足够大的n

More precisely, if we assume p(x1,…, xn) continuous in all the xi for all n, then for sufficiently large n

对于 ( x 1 ,…, x n )的所有选择，除了总概率小于δ的集合外，δ和∊任意小。如果我们将空间划分为大量小单元，则这符合遍历性质。

for all choices of (x1,…, xn) apart from a set whose total probability is less than δ, with δ and ∊ arbitrarily small. This follows from the ergodic property if we divide the space into a large number of small cells.

H与体积的关系可以表述如下：在同样的假设下，考虑与p ( x 1 ,…, x n )对应的n维空间。设V n ( q ) 为该空间中最小的体积，其内部包含全概率q。那么

The relation of H to volume can be stated as follows: Under the same assumptions consider the n dimensional space corresponding to p(x1,…, xn). Let Vn(q) be the smallest volume in this space which includes in its interior a total probability q. Then

只要q不等于 0 或 1。

provided q does not equal 0 or 1.

这些结果表明，对于较大的n，存在一个相当明确的高概率体积（至少在对数意义上），并且在这个体积内，概率密度相对均匀（再次在对数意义上）。

These results show that for large n there is a rather well-defined volume (at least in the logarithmic sense) of high probability, and that within this volume the probability density is relatively uniform (again in the logarithmic sense).

在白噪声情况下，分布函数由下式给出：

In the white noise case the distribution function is given by

由于这仅取决于 ∑ x i 2，因此等概率密度的表面是球体，整个分布具有球对称性。高概率区域是半径为 的球体。当n → ∞ 时，位于半径为 的球体之外的概率趋近于零，无论∊和乘以球体体积的对数有多小，都趋近于 log 。

Since this depends only on ∑xi2 the surfaces of equal probability density are spheres and the entire distribution has spherical symmetry. The region of high probability is a sphere of radius . As n → ∞ the probability of being outside a sphere of radius approaches zero however small ∊ and times the logarithm of the volume of the sphere approaches log .

在连续情况下，不用集合的熵H而是用派生量（我们称之为熵功率）来处理会更方便。它被定义为白噪声中的功率，该白噪声限制在与原始集合相同的频带内，并且具有相同的熵。换句话说，如果H ′ 是集合的熵，则其熵功率为

In the continuous case it is convenient to work not with the entropy H of an ensemble but with a derived quantity which we will call the entropy power. This is defined as the power in a white noise limited to the same band as the original ensemble and having the same entropy. In other words if H′ is the entropy of an ensemble its entropy power is

在几何图形中，这相当于用具有相同体积的球体的平方半径来测量高概率体积。由于白噪声在给定功率下具有最大熵，因此任何噪声的熵功率都小于或等于其实际功率。

In the geometrical picture this amounts to measuring the high probability volume by the squared radius of a sphere having the same volume. Since white noise has the maximum entropy for a given power, the entropy power of any noise is less than or equal to its actual power.

22. 线性滤波器中的熵损失

22. Entropy Loss in Linear Filters

定理 14：如果一个集合在频带 W 中每个自由度具有熵 H 1 ，并且通过特征为 Y ( f )的滤波器，则输出集合具有熵

Theorem 14: If an ensemble having an entropy H1 per degree of freedom in band W is passed through a filter with characteristic Y (f) the output ensemble has an entropy

滤波器的操作本质上是坐标的线性变换。如果我们将不同的频率分量视为原始坐标系，则新的频率分量仅仅是旧频率分量乘以因子。因此，坐标变换矩阵本质上是根据这些坐标对角化的。变换的雅可比矩阵为（对于n 个正弦和n 个余弦分量）

The operation of the filter is essentially a linear transformation of coordinates. If we think of the different frequency components as the original coordinate system, the new frequency components are merely the old ones multiplied by factors. The coordinate transformation matrix is thus essentially diagonalized in terms of these coordinates. The Jacobian of the transformation is (for n sine and n cosine components)

其中f i在W带中等距分布。在极限情况下

where the fi are equally spaced through the band W. This becomes in the limit

由于J是常数，其平均值是相同的量，应用熵随坐标变化的定理，结果如下。我们也可以用熵功率来表达它。因此，如果第一个集合的熵功率为N 1，则第二个集合的熵功率为

Since J is constant its average value is the same quantity and applying the theorem on the change of entropy with a change of coordinates, the result follows. We may also phrase it in terms of the entropy power. Thus if the entropy power of the first ensemble is N1 that of the second is

表一

TABLE I

最终的熵功率是初始熵功率乘以滤波器的几何平均增益。如果增益以db为单位，则输出熵功率将增加db增益除以W的算术平均值。

The final entropy power is the initial entropy power multiplied by the geometric mean gain of the filter. If the gain is measured in db, then the output entropy power will be increased by the arithmetic mean db gain over W.

表一中计算了一系列理想增益特性的熵功率损耗（也以db表示）。还给出了这些滤波器在W = 1/2 π时的脉冲响应，其中相位假定为 0。

In Table I the entropy power loss has been calculated (and also expressed in db) for a number of ideal gain characteristics. The impulsive responses of these filters are also given for W = 1/2π, with phase assumed to be 0.

可以从这些结果中获得许多其他情况的熵损失。例如，第一种情况的熵功率因子也适用于通过ω轴的度量保持变换从 1 — ω获得的任何增益特性。特别是线性增加的增益G ( ω ) = ω，或 0 和 1 之间的“锯齿”特性具有相同的熵损失。倒数增益具有倒数因子。因此具有因子e 2。将增益提升到任何幂都会将因子提升到该幂。

The entropy loss for many other cases can be obtained from these results. For example the entropy power factor for the first case also applies to any gain characteristic obtained from 1 — ω by a measure preserving transformation of the ω axis. In particular a linearly increasing gain G (ω) = ω, or a “saw tooth” characteristic between 0 and 1 have the same entropy loss. The reciprocal gain has the reciprocal factor. Thus has the factor e2. Raising the gain to any power raises the factor to this power.

23. 两个集合之和的熵

23. Entropy of the Sum of Two Ensembles

如果我们有两个函数集合f α ( t ) 和g β ( t )，我们可以通过“加法”形成一个新的集合。假设第一个集合具有概率密度函数p ( x 1 ,…, x n )，第二个集合具有概率密度函数q ( x 1 ,…, x n )。那么总和的密度函数由卷积给出：

If we have two ensembles of functions fα(t) and gβ(t) we can form a new ensemble by “addition.” Suppose the first ensemble has the probability density function p(x1,…, xn) and the second q(x1,…, xn). Then the density function for the sum is given by the convolution:

物理上，这相当于添加由原始函数集合所表示的噪声或信号。

Physically this corresponds to adding the noises or signals represented by the original ensembles of functions.

附录6中得出了以下结果。

The following result is derived in Appendix 6.

定理 15: 设两个集合的平均功率为 N 1 和 N 2 ，令它们的熵功率分别为 1 和 2。则和的熵功率 3受以下限制

Theorem 15: Let the average power of two ensembles be N1 and N2 and let their entropy powers be 1 and 2. Then the entropy power of the sum, 3, is bounded by

白高斯噪声具有一种特殊的性质，即它可以吸收任何可能添加到其中的其他噪声或信号集合，其结果熵功率大约等于白噪声功率与信号功率之和（从平均信号值测得，通常为零），前提是信号功率在某种意义上小于噪声。

White Gaussian noise has the peculiar property that it can absorb any other noise or signal ensemble which may be added to it with a resultant entropy power approximately equal to the sum of the white noise power and the signal power (measured from the average signal value, which is normally zero), provided the signal power is small, in a certain sense, compared to the noise.

考虑与这些具有n维的集合相关的函数空间。白噪声对应于此空间中的球面高斯分布。信号集合对应于另一个概率分布，不一定是高斯或球面分布。让此分布关于其重心的二阶矩为a ij。也就是说，如果p ( x 1 ,…, x n ) 是密度分布函数

Consider the function space associated with these ensembles having n dimensions. The white noise corresponds to the spherical Gaussian distribution in this space. The signal ensemble corresponds to another probability distribution, not necessarily Gaussian or spherical. Let the second moments of this distribution about its center of gravity be aij. That is, if p(x1,…, xn) is the density distribution function

其中α i是重心坐标。现在α ij是正定二次型，我们可以旋转坐标系，使其与该形式的主方向对齐。然后a ij简化为对角形式b ii。我们要求每个b ii都小于N（球面分布的平方半径）。

where the αi are the coordinates of the center of gravity. Now αij is a positive definite quadratic form, and we can rotate our coordinate system to align it with the principal directions of this form. aij is then reduced to diagonal form bii. We require that each bii be small compared to N, the squared radius of the spherical distribution.

在这种情况下，噪声和信号的卷积产生近似高斯分布，其对应的二次形式为

In this case the convolution of the noise and signal produce approximately a Gaussian distribution whose corresponding quadratic form is

N + b二。

N + bii.

该分布的熵为

The entropy power of this distribution is

[II( N + b ii )] 1/ n

[II(N + bii)]1/n

或大约

or approximately

最后一项是信号功率，第一个项是噪声功率。

The last term is the signal power, while the first is the noise power.

1在数学术语中，函数属于测度空间，其总测度为 1。

1In mathematical terminology the functions belong to a measure space whose total measure is unity.

2这种表示可以用作带限白噪声的定义。它具有某些优势，因为它涉及的限制操作比过去使用的定义要少。“白噪声”这个名称已经在文献中根深蒂固，也许有些不幸。在光学中，白光意味着任何连续光谱（与点光谱形成对比）或随波长（这与随频率平坦的光谱不同）。

2 This representation can be used as a definition of band limited white noise. It has certain advantages in that it involves fewer limiting operations than do definitions that have been used in the past. The name “white noise,” already firmly intrenched in the literature, is perhaps somewhat unfortunate. In optics white light means either any continuous spectrum as contrasted with a point spectrum, or a spectrum which is flat with wavelength (which is not the same as a spectrum flat with frequency).

3这是著名的遍历定理，或者说是该定理的一个方面，Birkhoff、von Neumann 和 Koopman 用略有不同的表述证明了该定理，随后 Wiener、Hopf、Hurewicz 等人对其进行了推广。关于遍历理论的文献非常丰富，读者可以参阅这些作者的论文以获得精确而普遍的表述；例如，E. Hopf 的“遍历定理”，《数学及其边界》，第 5 卷；“论因果统计和概率”，《数学和物理学杂志》，第 XIII 卷，第 1 期，1934 年；N. Wiener 的“遍历定理”，《杜克数学杂志》，第 5 卷，1939 年。

3 This is the famous ergodic theorem or rather one aspect of this theorem which was proved in somewhat different formulations by Birkhoff, von Neumann, and Koopman, and subsequently generalized by Wiener, Hopf, Hurewicz and others. The literature on ergodic theory is quite extensive and the reader is referred to the papers of these writers for precise and general formulations; e.g., E. Hopf “Ergodentheorie,” Ergebnisse der Mathematic und ihrer Grenzgebiete, v. 5; “On Causality Statistics and Probability,” Journal of Mathematics and Physics, v. XIII, No. 1, 1934; N. Wiener “The Ergodic Theorem,” Duke Mathematical Journal, v. 5, 1939.

4通信理论的很多基本哲学和理论都深受维纳的影响。他的经典 NDRC 报告《平稳时间序列的插值、外推和平滑》（Wiley，1949 年）首次明确阐述了通信理论作为统计问题，即对时间序列操作的研究。这项工作虽然主要涉及线性预测和过滤问题，但却是与本文相关的重要参考资料。我们也可以参考维纳的《控制论》（Wiley，1948 年），该书讨论了通信和控制的一般问题。

4 Communication theory is heavily indebted to Wiener for much of its basic philosophy and theory. His classic NDRC report, The Interpolation, Extrapolation, and Smoothing of Stationary Time Series (Wiley, 1949), contains the first clear-cut formulation of communication theory as a statistical problem, the study of operations on time series. This work, although chiefly concerned with the linear prediction and filtering problem, is an important collateral reference in connection with the present paper. We may also refer here to Wiener's Cybernetics (Wiley, 1948), dealing with the general problems of communication and control.

5有关该定理的证明和进一步的讨论，请参阅作者的论文“噪声下的通信”，发表于《无线电工程师学会会刊》第 37 卷第 1 期，1949 年 1 月，第 10-21 页。

5 For a proof of this theorem and further discussion see the author's paper “Communication in the Presence of Noise” published in the Proceedings of the Institute of Radio Engineers, v. 37, No. 1, Jan., 1949, pp. 10-21.

四

IV

连续通道

The Continuous Channel

24.连续通道的容量

24. The Capacity of a Continuous Channel

在连续信道中，输入或发射信号将是属于特定集合的时间连续函数f ( t )，而输出或接收信号将是这些函数的扰动版本。我们将仅考虑发射和接收信号都限制在特定频带W的情况。然后，对于时间T，它们可以用 2 TW数指定，其统计结构可以用有限维分布函数指定。因此，发射信号的统计数据将由以下公式确定

In a continuous channel the input or transmitted signals will be continuous functions of time f(t) belonging to a certain set, and the output or received signals will be perturbed versions of these. We will consider only the case where both transmitted and received signals are limited to a certain band W. They can then be specified, for a time T, by 2TW numbers, and their statistical structure by finite dimensional distribution functions. Thus the statistics of the transmitted signal will be determined by

P（x1，…，xn ） = P（x ）

P(x1,…, xn) = P(x)

噪声的条件概率分布

and those of the noise by the conditional probability distribution

P x 1 ,…, x n ( y 1 ,…, y n ) = P x ( y )。

Px1,…, xn(y1,…, yn) = Px(y).

连续信道的信息传输速率定义与离散信道类似，即

The rate of transmission of information for a continuous channel is defined in a way analogous to that for a discrete channel, namely

R = H ( x ) —Hy ( x )​

R = H(x) — Hy(x)

其中H ( x ) 是输入的熵，Hy ( x )是模糊性。信道容量C定义为当我们在所有可能的集合中改变输入时R的最大值。这意味着在有限维近似中，我们必须改变P ( x ) = P ( x1 ,…, xn ) 并最大化

where H(x) is the entropy of the input and Hy(x) the equivocation. The channel capacity C is defined as the maximum of R when we vary the input over all possible ensembles. This means that in a finite dimensional approximation we must vary P(x) = P (x1,…, xn) and maximize

这可以写成

This can be written

利用以下公式可得：∫∫P ( x,y ) logP ( x ) dxdy = ∫P ( x )logP ( x ) dx ，信道容量可表示如下：

using the fact that ∫∫ P(x, y) log P(x) dx dy = ∫ P(x) log P(x) dx. The channel capacity is thus expressed as follows:

从这种形式中可以明显看出，R和C与坐标系无关，因为当x和y以任何一一对应的方式变换时，对数中的分子和分母将乘以相同的因子。C 的这个积分表达式比H ( x ) — H y ( x )更通用。如果正确解释（参见附录 7 ） ，它将始终存在，而H ( x ) — H y ( x ) 在某些情况下可能会呈现不确定形式 ∞ — ∞。例如，如果x在其n维近似中被限制在维数少于n的表面上，就会出现这种情况。

It is obvious in this form that R and C are independent of the coordinate system since the numerator and denominator in log will be multiplied by the same factors when x and y are transformed in any one-to-one way. This integral expression for C is more general than H(x) — Hy(x). Properly interpreted (see Appendix 7) it will always exist while H(x) — Hy(x) may assume an indeterminate form ∞ — ∞ in some cases. This occurs, for example, if x is limited to a surface of fewer dimensions than n in its n dimensional approximation.

如果用于计算H ( x ) 和H y ( x )的对数底数为 2，则C就是每秒通过信道发送的最大二进制位数，其歧义性可任意小，就像离散情况一样。这可以通过将信号空间划分为大量小单元来从物理上看出来，这些小单元足够小，以至于信号x被扰动到点y的概率密度P x ( y )在单元（x或y）上基本恒定。如果将单元视为不同的点，则情况与离散信道基本相同，并且将适用那里使用的证明。但从物理上可以清楚地看出，只要区域足够小，将体积量化为单个点在任何实际情况下都不会显著改变最终答案。因此，容量将是离散细分容量的极限，而这正是上面定义的连续容量。

If the logarithmic base used in computing H(x) and Hy(x) is two then C is the maximum number of binary digits that can be sent per second over the channel with arbitrarily small equivocation, just as in the discrete case. This can be seen physically by dividing the space of signals into a large number of small cells, sufficiently small so that the probability density Px(y) of signal x being perturbed to point y is substantially constant over a cell (either of x or y). If the cells are considered as distinct points the situation is essentially the same as a discrete channel and the proofs used there will apply. But it is clear physically that this quantizing of the volume into individual points cannot in any practical situation alter the final answer significantly, provided the regions are sufficiently small. Thus the capacity will be the limit of the capacities for the discrete subdivisions and this is just the continuous capacity defined above.

从数学角度来看，首先可以证明（见附录 7），如果u是消息，x是信号，y是接收信号（受噪声干扰），v是恢复的消息，则

On the mathematical side it can be shown first (see Appendix 7) that if u is the message, x is the signal, y is the received signal (perturbed by noise) and v the recovered message then

H ( x ) — Hy ( x ) ≥H ( u ) — Hv ( u )

H(x) — Hy(x) ≥ H(u) — Hv(u)

无论对u执行什么操作得到x或对y执行什么操作得到v。因此，无论我们如何编码二进制数字以获得信号，或者如何解码接收信号以恢复消息，二进制数字的离散速率都不会超过我们定义的信道容量。另一方面，在非常一般的条件下，有可能找到一个编码系统，以速率C传输二进制数字，并且其歧义或错误频率尽可能小。例如，如果当我们对信号函数取有限维近似空间时，P ( x, y ) 在x和y上都是连续的，除了一组概率为零的点。

regardless of what operations are performed on u to obtain x or on y to obtain v. Thus no matter how we encode the binary digits to obtain the signal, or how we decode the received signal to recover the message, the discrete rate for the binary digits does not exceed the channel capacity we have defined. On the other hand, it is possible under very general conditions to find a coding system for transmitting binary digits at the rate C with as small an equivocation or frequency of errors as desired. This is true, for example, if, when we take a finite dimensional approximating space for the signal functions, P(x, y) is continuous in both x and y except at a set of points of probability zero.

一个重要的特殊情况是噪声被添加到信号中，并且与信号无关（在概率意义上）。那么P x ( y ) 仅是（矢量）差n = ( y — x )的函数，

An important special case occurs when the noise is added to the signal and is independent of it (in the probability sense). Then Px(y) is a function only of the (vector) difference n = (y — x),

Px ( y ) = Q ( y - x )

Px(y) = Q(y — x)

我们可以给噪声赋予一个确定的熵（与信号的统计数据无关），即分布Q ( n ) 的熵，这个熵记为H ( n )。

and we can assign a definite entropy to the noise (independent of the statistics of the signal), namely the entropy of the distribution Q(n). This entropy will be denoted by H(n).

定理 16：如果信号和噪声是独立的，并且接收信号是发射信号和噪声的总和，则传输速率为

Theorem 16: If the signal and noise are independent and the received signal is the sum of the transmitted signal and the noise then the rate of transmission is

R = H ( y )-H ( n )，

R = H(y) — H(n),

即接收信号的熵减去噪声的熵。信道容量为

i.e., the entropy of the received signal less the entropy of the noise. The channel capacity is

因为y = x + n，我们有：

We have, since y = x + n:

H（x，y）= H（x，n）。

H(x, y) = H(x, n).

展开左边，利用x和n独立的事实

Expanding the left side and using the fact that x and n are independent

H ( y )+ Hy ( x )= H ( x )+ H ( n ) 。

H(y) + Hy(x) = H(x) + H(n).

因此

Hence

R = H ( x )—Hy ( x ) = H ( y ) —H ( n ) 。

R = H(x) — Hy(x) = H(y) — H(n).

由于H ( n ) 与P ( x )无关，最大化R需要最大化H ( y )，即接收信号的熵。如果有如果对发射信号集合施加某些约束，则接收信号的熵必须在这些约束条件下最大化。

Since H(n) is independent of P(x), maximizing R requires maximizing H(y), the entropy of the received signal. If there are certain constraints on the ensemble of transmitted signals, the entropy of the received signal must be maximized subject to these constraints.

25. 具有平均功率限制的信道容量

25. Channel Capacity with an Average Power Limitation

当噪声是白热噪声且发射信号被限制为某个平均功率P 时，定理 16的一个简单应用就出现了。然后，接收信号的平均功率为P + N，其中N是平均噪声功率。当接收信号也形成白噪声集合时，它们的熵最大，因为这是功率P + N的最大可能熵，并且可以通过适当选择发射信号集合来获得，即如果它们形成功率为P的白噪声集合。接收集合的熵（每秒）为

A simple application of Theorem 16 occurs when the noise is a white thermal noise and the transmitted signals are limited to a certain average power P. Then the received signals have an average power P + N where N is the average noise power. The maximum entropy for the received signals occurs when they also form a white noise ensemble since this is the greatest possible entropy for a power P + N and can be obtained by a suitable choice of the ensemble of transmitted signals, namely if they form a white noise ensemble of power P. The entropy (per second) of the received ensemble is then

H ( y ) = Wlog2πe ( P + N ) ，

H(y) = W log 2πe (P + N),

噪声熵为

and the noise entropy is

H ( n ) = Wlog2πeN。​

H(n) = W log 2πeN.

信道容量为

The channel capacity is

总结如下：

Summarizing we have the following:

定理 17：当平均发射机功率限制为 P 时，受功率为 N 的白热噪声干扰的 W 频段信道的容量由下式给出：

Theorem 17: The capacity of a channel of band W perturbed by white thermal noise of power N when the average transmitter power is limited to P is given by

这意味着，通过足够复杂的编码系统，我们可以以每秒W log 2 位的速率传输二进制数字，错误频率任意小。如果没有明确的正错误频率，任何编码系统都不可能以更高的速率传输。

This means that by sufficiently involved encoding systems we can transmit binary digits at the rate W log2 bits per second, with arbitrarily small frequency of errors. It is not possible to transmit at a higher rate by any encoding system without a definite positive frequency of errors.

为了接近这个极限传输速率，传输的信号在统计特性上必须接近白噪声。6接近理想速率的系统可以描述如下：假设构造M = 2 s 个白噪声样本，每个样本持续时间为T。这些样本被分配从 0 到 ( M — 1) 的二进制数。在发射机处，消息序列被分成s个组，并且对于每个组，相应的噪声样本作为信号传输。在接收机处，已知M 个样本，并将实际接收信号（受噪声干扰）与每个样本进行比较。选择与接收信号具有最小 RMS 差异的样本作为传输信号，并重建相应的二进制数。此过程相当于选择最可能的（后验）信号。使用的噪声样本数量M将取决于可容忍的错误频率∊，但对于几乎所有的样本选择，我们都有

To approximate this limiting rate of transmission the transmitted signals must approximate, in statistical properties, a white noise.6 A system which approaches the ideal rate may be described as follows: Let M = 2s samples of white noise be constructed each of duration T. These are assigned binary numbers from 0 to (M — 1). At the transmitter the message sequences are broken up into groups of s and for each group the corresponding noise sample is transmitted as the signal. At the receiver the M samples are known and the actual received signal (perturbed by noise) is compared with each of them. The sample which has the least R.M.S. discrepancy from the received signal is chosen as the transmitted signal and the corresponding binary number reconstructed. This process amounts to choosing the most probable (a posteriori) signal. The number M of noise samples used will depend on the tolerable frequency ∊ of errors, but for almost all selections of samples we have

这样，不管∊选得多小，只要T足够大，我们就能在时间T内传输尽可能接近TW对数二进制数字。

so that no matter how small ∊ is chosen, we can, by taking T sufficiently large, transmit as near as we wish to TW log binary digits in the time T.

其他几位作者也独立开发了与白噪声情况下的C = W log类似的公式，尽管解释略有不同。在这方面，我们可以提到 N. Wiener、 7 WG Tuller 8和 H. Sullivan 的作品。

Formulas similar to C = W log for the white noise case have been developed independently by several other writers, although with somewhat different interpretations. We may mention the work of N. Wiener,7 W. G. Tuller,8 and H. Sullivan in this connection.

对于任意扰动噪声（不一定是白热噪声），确定信道容量C所涉及的最大化问题似乎无法明确解决。但是，可以根据平均噪声功率N和噪声熵功率N 1为C设置上限和下限。在大多数情况下，这些界限足够接近并结合实际案例，给出满意的解决办法。

In the case of an arbitrary perturbing noise (not necessarily white thermal noise) it does not appear that the maximizing problem involved in determining the channel capacity C can be solved explicitly. However, upper and lower bounds can be set for C in terms of the average noise power N and the noise entropy power N1. These bounds are sufficiently close together in most practical cases to furnish a satisfactory solution to the problem.

定理 18：受任意噪声干扰的 W 频段信道的容量受以下不等式限制

Theorem 18: The capacity of a channel of band W perturbed by an arbitrary noise is bounded by the inequalities

在哪里

where

P   =平均发射机功率
P  = average transmitter power
N   =平均噪声功率
N  = average noise power

N 1 =噪声的熵功率。

N1 = entropy power of the noise.

这里扰动信号的平均功率再次为P + N。如果接收信号是白噪声，则该功率的最大熵将为W log 2 πe ( P + N )。这可能无法实现；也就是说，可能没有任何一组发射信号与扰动噪声一起在接收器处产生白色热噪声，但至少这为H ( y )设置了上限。因此，我们有

Here again the average power of the perturbed signals will be P + N. The maximum entropy for this power would occur if the received signal were white noise and would be W log 2πe(P + N). It may not be possible to achieve this; i.e., there may not be any ensemble of transmitted signals which, added to the perturbing noise, produce a white thermal noise at the receiver, but at least this sets an upper bound to H(y). We have, therefore

C = 最大H ( y ) — H ( n )

C = Max H(y) — H(n)

       ≤Wlog2πe （P + N）—Wlog2πeN1。​​​​​​
       ≤ W log 2πe(P + N) — W log 2πeN1.

这是定理中给出的上限。如果我们将传输信号设为功率为P的白噪声，则可以通过考虑速率来获得下限。在这种情况下，接收信号的熵功率必须至少与功率为P + N 1的白噪声一样大，因为我们在定理 15中已经证明，两个集合之和的熵功率大于或等于各个熵功率之和。因此

This is the upper limit given in the theorem. The lower limit can be obtained by considering the rate if we make the transmitted signal a white noise, of power P. In this case the entropy power of the received signal must be at least as great as that of a white noise of power P + N1 since we have shown in Theorem 15 that the entropy power of the sum of two ensembles is greater than or equal to the sum of the individual entropy powers. Hence

最大H ( y ) ≥ W log 2 πe ( P + N 1 )

Max H(y) ≥ W log 2πe(P + N1)

和

and

随着P 的增加，定理 18中的上限和下限相互接近，因此我们有渐近速率

As P increases, the upper and lower bounds in Theorem 18 approach each other, so we have as an asymptotic rate

如果噪声本身是白噪声，则N = N 1，结果简化为之前证明的公式：

If the noise is itself white, N = N1 and the result reduces to the formula proved previously :

如果噪声服从高斯分布，但频谱不一定平坦，则 N 1是W频段内各个频率的噪声功率的几何平均值。因此

If the noise is Gaussian but with a spectrum which is not necessarily flat, N1 is the geometric mean of the noise power over the various frequencies in the band W. Thus

其中N ( f ) 是频率f处的噪声功率。

where N(f) is the noise power at frequency f.

定理 19：如果我们将给定发射机功率 P 的容量设置为

Theorem 19: If we set the capacity for a given transmitter power P equal to

则η随P的增加而单调递减，并趋近于0作为极限。

then η is monotonic decreasing as P increases and approaches 0 as a limit.

假设给定功率P 1 ，信道容量为

Suppose that for a given power P1 the channel capacity is

这意味着，当将最佳信号分布（例如p ( x )）添加到噪声分布q ( x ) 中时，将产生一个接收分布r ( y )，其熵功率为 ( P 1 + N — η 1 )。让我们通过在信号中添加功率为 ∆ P的白噪声，将功率增加到P 1 + ∆ P。接收信号的熵现在至少为

This means that the best signal distribution, say p(x), when added to the noise distribution q(x), gives a received distribution r(y) whose entropy power is (P1 + N — η1). Let us increase the power to P1 + ∆P by adding a white noise of power ∆P to the signal. The entropy of the received signal is now at least

H ( y ) = W log 2 πe ( P 1 + N — η 1 + Δ P )

H(y) = W log 2πe(P1 + N — η1 + ΔP)

通过应用和的最小熵功率定理。因此，由于我们可以达到所示的H，最大化分布的熵必须至少同样大，并且η必须单调递减。为了证明当P → ∞ 时η → 0，考虑一个具有较大P 的白噪声信号。无论扰动噪声是什么，如果P足够大，则接收信号将近似为白噪声，即其熵功率接近P + N。

by application of the theorem on the minimum entropy power of a sum. Hence, since we can attain the H indicated, the entropy of the maximizing distribution must be at least as great and η must be monotonic decreasing. To show that η → 0 as P → ∞ consider a signal which is a white noise with a large P. Whatever the perturbing noise, the received signal will be approximately a white noise, if P is sufficiently large, in the sense of having an entropy power approaching P + N.

26. 具有峰值功率限制的信道容量

26. The Channel Capacity with a Peak Power Limitation

在某些应用中，发射机不受平均值限制功率输出，而是峰值瞬时功率。计算信道容量的问题就是最大化（通过改变传输符号集合）

In some applications the transmitter is limited not by the average power output but by the peak instantaneous power. The problem of calculating the channel capacity is then that of maximizing (by variation of the ensemble of transmitted symbols)

H ( y ) —H ( n )

H(y) — H(n)

受制于集合中的所有函数f ( t ) 都小于或等于 的约束，例如，对于所有t。这种类型的约束在数学上不如平均功率限制那么有效。对于这种情况，我们得到的最多结果是对所有 都有效的下限、“渐近”上限（对较大的 有效）和对较小的的渐近值C。

subject to the constraint that all the functions f(t) in the ensemble be less than or equal to , say, for all t. A constraint of this type does not work out as well mathematically as the average power limitation. The most we have obtained for this case is a lower bound valid for all , an “asymptotic” upper bound (valid for large )and an asymptotic value of C for small.

定理 20：当 W 波段受到功率为 N 的白热噪声干扰时，信道容量 C 有界于

Theorem 20: The channel capacity C for a band W perturbed by white thermal noise of power N is bounded by

其中 S 是允许的峰值发射机功率。对于足够大的

where S is the peak allowed transmitter power. For sufficiently large

其中∊任意小。当 → 0 时（假设 W 波段从0 开始）

where ∊ is arbitrarily small. As → 0 (and provided the band W starts at 0)

我们希望最大化接收信号的熵。如果很大，这将在我们最大化传输集合的熵时非常接近地发生。

We wish to maximize the entropy of the received signal. If is large this will occur very nearly when we maximize the entropy of the transmitted ensemble.

渐近上界是通过放宽集合的条件获得的。我们假设功率不是在每个时刻都限制为S ，而是仅在样本点限制为 S。在这些条件下，传输集合的最大熵弱化条件下的熵肯定大于或等于原始条件下的熵。这个改变的问题很容易解决。如果不同的样本是独立的，并且具有从 —到 + 的恒定分布函数，则会出现最大熵。熵可以计算为

The asymptotic upper bound is obtained by relaxing the conditions on the ensemble. Let us suppose that the power is limited to S not at every instant of time, but only at the sample points. The maximum entropy of the transmitted ensemble under these weakened conditions is certainly greater than or equal to that under the original conditions. This altered problem can be solved easily. The maximum entropy occurs if the different samples are independent and have a distribution function which is constant from — to + . The entropy can be calculated as

W log 4 S。

W log 4S.

接收到的信号的熵将小于

The received signal will then have an entropy less than

W log (4 S + 2 πeN )(1 + ∊ )

W log (4S + 2πeN)(1 + ∊)

其中 ∊ → 0 当→ ∞ 时，信道容量通过减去白噪声的熵获得，W log 2 πeN：

with ∊ → 0 as → ∞ and the channel capacity is obtained by subtracting the entropy of the white noise, W log 2πeN :

这是对通道容量的要求的上限。

This is the desired upper bound to the channel capacity.

为了获得下限，请考虑相同的函数集合。让这些函数通过具有三角传输特性的理想滤波器。增益在频率 0 时为 1，在频率W时线性下降至增益 0。我们首先表明滤波器的输出函数始终具有峰值功率限制S （不仅仅是采样点）。首先我们注意到，进入滤波器的脉冲产生

To obtain a lower bound consider the same ensemble of functions. Let these functions be passed through an ideal filter with a triangular transfer characteristic. The gain is to be unity at frequency 0 and decline linearly down to gain 0 at frequency W. We first show that the output functions of the filter have a peak power limitation S at all times (not just the sample points). First we note that a pulse going into the filter produces

在输出中。此函数永远不会为负。输入函数（在一般情况下）可以被认为是一系列移位函数的总和

in the output. This function is never negative. The input function (in the general case) can be thought of as the sum of a series of shifted functions

其中，样本的振幅a不大于。因此，输出是上述非负形式的移位函数之和，这些函数具有相同的系数。这些函数是非负的，因此可以得到任何t的最大正值当所有系数a都具有最大正值时，即。在这种情况下，输入函数是振幅常数，并且由于滤波器具有直流单位增益，因此输出相同。因此，输出集合具有峰值功率S。

where a, the amplitude of the sample, is not greater than . Hence the output is the sum of shifted functions of the non-negative form above with the same coefficients. These functions being non-negative, the greatest positive value for any t is obtained when all the coefficients a have their maximum positive values, i.e., . In this case the input function was a constant of amplitude and since the filter has unit gain for D.C., the output is the same. Hence the output ensemble has a peak power S.

输出集合的熵可以通过使用处理这种情况的定理从输入集合的熵计算出来。输出熵等于输入熵加上滤波器的几何平均增益：

The entropy of the output ensemble can be calculated from that of the input ensemble by using the theorem dealing with such a situation. The output entropy is equal to the input entropy plus the geometrical mean gain of the filter:

因此输出熵是

Hence the output entropy is

且信道容量大于

and the channel capacity is greater than

我们现在想证明，对于较小的（峰值信号功率除以平均白噪声功率），信道容量大约为

We now wish to show that, for small (peak signal power over average white noise power), the channel capacity is approximately

更准确地说是→ 0。由于平均信号功率P小于或等于峰值S，因此对于所有

More precisely as → 0. Since the average signal power P is less than or equal to the peak S, it follows that for all

因此，如果我们能找到一个函数集合，使得它们对应于接近W log (1 + )的速率，并且仅限于频带W和峰值S，则结果将得到证明。考虑以下类型的函数集合。一系列t个样本具有相同的值，要么是 +要么是 — ，那么接下来的t个样本具有相同的值，等等。系列是随机选择的，概率为 +和— 。如果这个集合通过具有三角增益特性（直流单位增益）的滤波器，则输出峰值限制为 ± S。此外，平均功率接近S，可以通过将t取得足够大来使其接近该值。可以通过应用噪声和小信号之和的定理来找到这个和热噪声之和的熵。如果满足该定理，则适用

Therefore, if we can find an ensemble of functions such that they correspond to a rate nearly W log (1 + ) and are limited to band W and peak S the result will be proved. Consider the ensemble of functions of the following type. A series of t samples have the same value, either + or — , then the next t samples have the same value, etc. The value for a series is chosen at random, probability for + and for — . If this ensemble be passed through a filter with triangular gain characteristic (unit gain at D.C.), the output is peak limited to ± S. Furthermore the average power is nearly S and can be made to approach this by taking t sufficiently large. The entropy of the sum of this and the thermal noise can be found by applying the theorem on the sum of a noise and a small signal. This theorem will apply if

足够小。这可以通过取足够小（在选择t之后）来确保。熵功率将是S+N，以尽可能接近所需的近似值，因此传输速率也尽可能接近我们希望的

is sufficiently small. This can be ensured by taking small enough (after t is chosen). The entropy power will be S+N to as close an approximation as desired, and hence the rate of transmission as near as we wish to

6白噪声情况的这一特性和其他特性在“噪声存在下的通信”一文中从几何角度进行了讨论
